name: Meteor Kamikaze Dash
description:
Created in 72 Hours for the 17th ScoreSpace Jam.

- by Gathrey Reeding

Theme: PROTECT

Some say only fools attempt this gauntlet.. or maybe not?

Do you have the twitchy fingers to keep your car alive?

The twisted RaceMap, littered with exploding Meteors and a slippery, twitchy auto-driving car! all this chaos to the beautiful sounds of Reckless Punk-Metal - by DavidKBD

Controls:

The car drives itself!

but can you steer?! 

A/D or Left-Arrow/Right-Arrow

will decide your fate!

Tips:

  • Health respawns at the same location after a certain amount of time
  • The walls are bouncy, if you time your turn just right, you can hit the wall and have it knock you in the opposite direction.
  • Only the explosion damages your car, there is a slight window where the flames are still burning, but your car can drive through it.. Find that sweet-spot.

3rd Party Assets:

  • Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/rock/reckless-punk-metal-music...
  • Car: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/4-toon-city-cars-205608
  • Meteor Rain VFX: by HovlStudio https://www.patreon.com/posts/27612937
